thread.title: TTC Extra: Latifa Lyles To The Contrary
thread.title_full: Video: TTC Extra: Latifa Lyles | Watch To The Contrary Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: TTC Extra: Latifa Lyles To The Contrary
text: In an interview with The Department of Labor's Women Bureau Director Latifa Lyles, she discusses the push to engage women in job sectors normally dominated by men. By increasing the job opportunities, women could obtain higher wages.
